channel.title: ANy Uber Coders? For my compiler? :)
channel.description:
Here's my compiler, it's simple and I like it... BUT, (I don't know if it's hard to do...), I want to have it so that when I compile it, that it will automatically close out if there are no errors, BUT will not if there are errors... Heres my Compiler: [code]@echo off title FuryScape Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause[/code]
Thanks. :)

item.title: ANy Uber Coders? For my compiler? :)
item.dc:creator: @spankjava spank
item.description:
@spankjava wrote:

[quote=“bugra52, post:3, topic:153443”]this 1 is way better

@echo off javac *.java pause goto run :run cls set CLASSPATH= java Helper[/quote]

wtf he asked for one that closed after it compiles not another compiler u toenail

item.title: ANy Uber Coders? For my compiler? :)

@system wrote:

this 1 is way better

@echo off javac *.java pause goto run :run cls set CLASSPATH= java Helper

item.title: ANy Uber Coders? For my compiler? :)
item.dc:creator: @spankjava spank
item.description:
@spankjava wrote:

lol this works

@echo off
title FuryScape Compiler
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java
exit
pause

Read full topic

Here’s my compiler, it’s simple and I like it… BUT, (I don’t know if it’s hard to do…), I want to have it so that when I compile it, that it will automatically close out if there are no errors, BUT will not if there are errors… Heres my Compiler:
